  quarto::quarto_render(
    input = rstudioapi::getActiveDocumentContext()$path,
    output_file = odytools::ody_add_version(
      rstudioapi::getActiveDocumentContext()$path |>
        basename() |>
        tools::file_path_sans_ext()
    )
  )
)

odytools:::save_lock()
